alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:54PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Graham and southeastern Pinal Counties through 645 PM MST... At 553 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness to 11 miles northeast of Mammoth. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mammoth, San Manuel, Dudleyville, Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness and Klondyke. This includes Route 77 between mile markers 106 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
